title: Panjab University finance board clears ₹326 crore for salary hike - Hindustan Times
content: Panjab University finance board clears ₹326 crore for salary hike  Hindustan Times
description: Over 680 permanent faculty members and 2,500 non-teaching staff at Panjab University have been awaiting implementation of revised pay-scales; governing body senate to take final call
